TopicTitle: VTOL engines! engage Inevitable Failure System!

Articles.Content:
![nURc1.png](http://i.imgur.com/nURc1.png)

Those wings are supposed to be symetrical.
If I look at throttle, altitude and vertical speed, I can see an even better problem...

And you died less than three seconds afterwards, yes?

Struts apply to any situation, mods too.

> 
> If I look at throttle, altitude and vertical speed, I can see an even better problem...

Caused by the Inevitable Failure System.

And yes, I did, Ascen.

I added struts to it now. And RCS thrusters for landing assistance.
